DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study to determine the safety and efficacy of sitagliptin in patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on metformin/peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor gamma (PPARg) agonist combination therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Sitagliptin Metformin/PPARg Agonist Combination Therapy Add-on (0431-052)
DOC.criteria: Patient has type 2 diabetes mellitus Patient is inadequately controlled while taking two oral antidiabetic medications Patient has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or history of ketoacidosis Patient required insulin therapy within the prior 3 months Patient has been taking Byetta (R) (exenatide) within the prior 3 months
